entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
